pageProps.content:
Experience

Shamwari Game Reserve is one of the most established wildlife areas in the Eastern Cape & is renowned for its Big 5 wildlife viewing, luxurious lodges & exceptional conservation initiatives.
Shamwari has 7 different lodges & 1 explorer camp, each providing distinct experiences: Explorer Camp, Sindile, Riverdene, Lobengula, Eagles Crag, Bayethe, Sarili & Long Lee Manor - each with its own style & brand of luxury.

Stay

Shamwari Explorer Camp offers a unique walking experience for guests looking for an authentic, adventurous safari. The camp enjoys a magical setting on a plateau set among the only basalt & granite extrusions on Shamwari.
There are only 3 explorer tents, each one fitted with 2 comfortable single beds (king convertible), a cupboard, 2 LED lights for nighttime use & an en-suite bathroom with a shower.
Wild animals can move through the camp at any time & although safety precautions have been followed in setting up camp, this remains a reality.

Activities

Shamwari’s diverse wilderness area makes Big 5 game viewing easy. The reserve is home to lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo & rhino as well as plenty of plains game & over 200 varieties of raptors & birds.
This wilderness bush camp can be booked between October to April & comprises a minimum 2-night trail. The walking trails are guided by an armed expert walking guide. Distances walked each day can last up to 4 hours. No persons under the age of 16 years will be able to participate.
